about_the_game:
Stranded on the far reaches of the galaxy, it falls upon you and your comrades to unite and chart a course back to Earth. Encounter alien civilizations, grappling with moral quandaries and diplomatic dilemmas as you navigate the cosmos. Will you prioritize survival or uphold the principles of humanity?

Engage in intense, strategic combat as you juggle power distribution between shields, weaponry, and propulsion. Employ tactics like stealth and hit-and-run assaults, or maintain a safe distance for strategic retreats. Adapt to the ever-changing battlefield by swiftly swapping out weapons to exploit enemy weaknesses. Victory lies in analyzing your foes and outmaneuvering them through cunning teamwork.

Traditional space simulators often fall short, offering vast but empty expanses with monotonous travel times. The more companions you bring, the less engagement for individual players. Too often, players are pigeonholed into specific roles, leaving them idle and disconnected. Our focus is to immerse you in an experience where every moment feels like a thrilling challenge. Never again will you find yourself waiting on your crewmates. Embark on a perilous journey through the cosmos, where every decision shapes your destiny among the stars.

Features

  • Multiplayer: Engage in thrilling online co-op adventures with friends as you navigate the cosmos together.
  • Explore a vast, unknown part of space: Embark on an epic journey through uncharted regions of the galaxy, uncovering mysteries and encountering diverse alien species.
  • Craft and research upgraded parts for your ship: Customize and enhance your vessel with a variety of specialized components and technologies to improve its performance and survivability.
  • Fight to defend yourself: Engage in intense space battles against hostile forces, utilizing strategy and skill to emerge victorious.
  • Forge alliances or subvert enemies: Navigate complex political landscapes, forming alliances with friendly factions or employing cunning tactics to undermine your adversaries.

Minigames

Play minigames designed to feel like operating different parts of your ship. We use minigames designed to take some of your time but allow you time to run and deal with other fires, like your helm controls literally being on fire.
  • Repair damaged stations
  • Dodge incoming attacks from enemies vessels in a Bullet hell.
  • Play a rhythm game to cool down your ships weapons.
  • Play a tug of war style game to manage how close you are to the enemy vessels
  • Play a pattern matching game to decipher the enemies statistics and form a plan of attack.
  • Boost your shields with a blocking game

name: Starbridge: The Voyage Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card that is compatible with either DirectX 11 or 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Star Bridge: A Voyage Home is an immersive co-op multiplayer adventure. Stranded on the far reaches of the universe, explore alien worlds, upgrade and repair your ship, investigate space anomalies, engage in trade and combat encounters with extraterrestrial beings on your journey back to Earth.
